TopicTitle: Does KSP 1.0.3 come direct from Squad?

Articles.Content: Or someone else? I'm leery of downloading stuff from others.

Squad isn't providing 1.0.3 anymore, just 1.0.4 and the previous stable version 0.90.0, so be leery.

You can get KSP from [**the Squad store**](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/)**,** [**GoG.com**](http://www.gog.com/game/kerbal_space_program)**,** [**GreenManGaming**](http://www.greenmangaming.com/s/gb/en/pc/games/simulation/kerbal-space-program/) **(Steam key),** [**Humble store**](https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/kerbalspaceprogram_storefront) **(also Steam key) or** [**Steam.**](http://store.steampowered.com/app/220200)

I do not recommend you use Amazon.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T12:19:21Z" title="08/11/2015 12:19  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**

I agree with Sal, if you are upgrading you want version 1.0.4, it's the latest release. The last release (Which is available at kerbalspaceprogram.com) is .90, if you are downloading anything before that it is probably not an officially licensed copy.

> 
> ...if you are downloading anything before that it is probably not an officially licensed copy.

If you're downloading from anywhere else it's almost certainly an illegal copy.
Steam, GOG, and Amazon are all alternate sellers that offer their own legitimate downloads.
